# NPM Package Generator

## Installation

```bash
$ npm install -g package-generator
```

## Quick Start

```bash
$ package test
```

## Usage

```bash
Usage: package <package-name>

Options:

  -v, --version  output the version number
  -s, --skip     Skip dependencies install and git init
  -h, --help     output usage information
```
